alert.note: Alert for Sierra Madre Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 30 at 2:51AM MDT until March 31 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 18 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph may create some instances of blowing snow. * WHERE...Sierra Madre Range. * WHEN...From 10 AM Thursday to 7 PM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Hikers and snowmobilers may easily become disoriented.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
